channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Storyteller(Neutral) converts into The Narrator(Unseen)
channel.description: > # [color=darkgray]The Storyteller[/color] > **[color=darkgray]Neutral Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Aura)** - If someone attacks you , you will survive but if they attack you again , you can no longer be healed and you will die. > > **Day Ability (Beginning of Story)** - You will become immune to **Mindwarp** and **Frame** tonight.(2 Uses) > **Day Ability (Change Tone)** - Change your night abilities' results.(Infinite uses - [2 Days Cooldown]. This only affects one ability. After you have used an ability , the results will be switched back.) > > **Night Ability (Narration)** - Target 2 players. You will see if they are the same faction.(Infinite Uses - You will see if they are in the same group of class types [Killer/Offensive] , [Support/Social] , [Special/Investigative] if you have used **Change Tone**.) > **Night Ability (Impersonation)** - Target up to 4 players. You will learn the name of the faction that has majority. Does not count as visiting. (3 Uses - You will see the exact classes of the players you have selected but their results will be mixed randomly if you have used **Change Tone** - Not usable until N3 - You will need to select atleast 3 players.) > **Goal:** *Survive to see **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] lose.* > > **[color=purple]Converts into[/color]:** > > # [color=purple]The Narrator[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Loud Voice)** - **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** will be able to receive your abilities' feedback. > > **Day Ability (Change Tone)** - Change your night abilities' results.(Infinite uses - [2 Days Cooldown]. This only affects one ability. After you have used an ability , the results will be switched back.) > > **Night Ability (Rewrite the Story)** - Target 2 players. You will see if they are the same class type. If they are , get their class type.(Infinite Uses - You will get a target's class type. You will not know who it belongs to. This will only be available if you have used **Change Tone**.) > **Night Ability (Ballad)** - See the exact classes of 2 players. Does not count as visiting.(1 Use) > **Goal: **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**'s goal.**

item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Narration) - Target 2 players. You will see if they are the same faction.(Infinite Uses - You will see if they are in the same group of class types [Killer/Offensive] , [Support/Social] , [Special/Investigative])

This shouldn’t be on a neutral class, it’s basically maid, if anything it should be on a BD class. (Though nerfed)

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Storyteller(Neutral) converts into The Narrator(Unseen)
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Storyteller

Neutral Investigative

Passive (Aura) - If someone attacks you , you will survive but if they attack you again , you can no longer be healed and you will die.

Day Ability (Beginning of Story) - You will become immune to Mindwarp and Frame tonight.(2 Uses)
Day Ability (Change Tone) - Change your night abilities’ results.(Infinite uses - [2 Days Cooldown]. This only affects one ability. After you have used an ability , the results will be switched back.)

Night Ability (Narration) - Target 2 players. You will see if they are the same faction.(Infinite Uses - You will see if they are in the same group of class types [Killer/Offensive] , [Support/Social] , [Special/Investigative] if you have used Change Tone.)
Night Ability (Impersonation) - Target up to 4 players. You will learn the name of the faction that has majority. Does not count as visiting. (3 Uses - You will see the exact classes of the players you have selected but their results will be mixed randomly if you have used Change Tone - Not usable until N3 - You will need to select atleast 3 players.)
Goal: Survive to see The Unseen/The Cult lose.

Converts into:

The Narrator

Unseen Investigative

Passive (Loud Voice) - The Unseen will be able to receive your abilities’ feedback.

Day Ability (Change Tone) - Change your night abilities’ results.(Infinite uses - [2 Days Cooldown]. This only affects one ability. After you have used an ability , the results will be switched back.)

Night Ability (Rewrite the Story) - Target 2 players. You will see if they are the same class type. If they are , get their class type.(Infinite Uses - You will get a target’s class type. You will not know who it belongs to. This will only be available if you have used Change Tone.)
Night Ability (Ballad) - See the exact classes of 2 players. Does not count as visiting.(1 Use)
Goal: The Unseen’s goal.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Storyteller(Neutral) converts into The Narrator(Unseen)
